title: Problem-Based Learning Design for Strengthening Science Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-Level Expertise in Science and Basic Leadership Competencies as a Manager
context.additional_context: Leadership development program for science field managers in corporations, focusing on enhancing problem-solving skills linked to actual job situations.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and propose solutions for complex problems encountered in real scientific work environments using problem-based learning (PBL)
Learners can design efficient scientific leadership decision-making processes using worked examples
Learners can revise their problem-solving strategies and select optimal learning paths through peer feedback

resources: Librarian Support System (Information Retrieval & Bibliographic Analysis)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
